title: Cheesey Corn Muffins
ingredients:
2½ cups self raising flour
½ cup fine polenta
1 cup milk
125g butter, melted
130g can corn kernels, drained
2 spring onions, finely chopped
½ cup grated cheddar cheese
12 semidried tomatoes, chopped (optional)
method:
Preheat oven to 210º C and grease muffin trays.  
Sift flour and polenta into large bowl and make a well in centre.
In another bowl, whisk together milk, butter and eggs and then add corn, spring onion, cheddar and salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into the well made in flour mix and fold gently until combined – don’t overmix.
Spoon into greased tins and bake for twenty to twenty-five minutes. 
Leave for five minutes before removing from tin.  
Nice served warm, split with a good spread of cold butter.
